definitions: (of an object) fixed firmly and deeply in a surrounding mass; implanted

examples.text: a gold ring with nine embedded stones

shortDefinitions: (of object) fixed firmly and deeply in surrounding mass

definitions: (of a phrase or clause) placed within another clause or sentence

examples.text: the embedded sentence has no overt introducer

shortDefinitions: (of phrase or clause) placed within another clause or sentence

definitions: (of a microprocessor) designed and built as an integral part of a system or device
shortDefinitions: (of microprocessor) designed and built as integral part of system or device

definitions: (of a journalist) attached to a military unit during a conflict

examples.text: embedded journalists were scrutinized for their ability to report with independence

shortDefinitions: (of journalist) attached to military unit during conflict
